author: mikeehsu
body: Updated the URL to VS Studio Community edition. The product is now out of beta and URL has moved.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@mikeehsu**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

title: Updated URL to VS Studio Community edition
